Reborn:UndeadAgility.NAME: Undead Agility

Reborn:Bladestorm.NAME: Bladestorm

Reborn:CrystallizeEssence.NAME: Crystallize Essence

Reborn:HellboundTechnique.NAME: Hellbound Technique
